actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to industrial development bonds used for residential rental housing in mixed-use structures.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow tax-exempt treatment (interest excluded from gross income) for industrial development bonds used for residential rental housing in mixed-use structures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to industrial development bonds used for residential rental housing in mixed-use structures.
